Uses of Package
tilt.handler.post

  • Packages that use tilt.handler.post 
    Package Description
    tilt.image
    This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.
    tilt.image.matchup
    Matching up fragments of lines in adjacent columns
    tilt.image.page
    The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.
  • Classes in tilt.handler.post used by tilt.image 
    Class and Description
    Options
    Store options for TILT2
    TextIndex
    An index into the uploaded HTML or TEXT, recording the positions of each word, number of words etc.

    Options
    Store options for TILT2
  • Classes in tilt.handler.post used by tilt.image.page

    Store options for TILT2
